description:
Yuki Itose is just a typical student dealing with the pressures of college. She is struggling one day on the train when an upperclassman named Itsuomi Nagi helps her out. As he gradually opens a new world to her, Yuki develops feelings for Itsuomi. A pure love story begins to grow.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Language Barrier
tags.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Bar
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a bar.

tags.name: Restaurant
tags.description: Features a business that prepares and serves food and drinks to customers. Also encompasses cafes and bistros.

node.description:
[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/morishita.suu/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/morisita_suu)

Mangaka duo consisting of writer Makiro (マキロ) and illustrator Nachiyan (なちやん).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sobacocco)

Originating from [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/).

Married to fellow animator [Kazuo Sakai](https://anilist.co/staff/119895/Kazuo-Sakai).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YukaliHashimoto) | [Blog (jp)](http://blog.livedoor.jp/marianne_amplifier/)

She is a composer, arranger and synthesizer programmer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sobacocco)

Originating from [Sunrise](https://anilist.co/studio/14/).

Married to fellow animator [Kazuo Sakai](https://anilist.co/staff/119895/Kazuo-Sakai).

**Date of Birth:** ?? ??, 1977
**Residency:** Tokyo, Japan

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryohirata0110)** | **[Blog (JP)](http://hirataryo.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/)**

**Ryou Hirata** is a Japanese animator and designer, who does prop, character and art design.
Affiliated with [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/) since 1987. Original peers included [Masaaki Yuasa](https://anilist.co/staff/100068/) and [Tatsuo Satou](https://anilist.co/staff/100391/).
__Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.
